• Get access token
  • Get access token
  • Explicit link text

# Get access token

# Request

Url: https://api.vektor-adv.com/connect/token
Method: POST
Type: form-data (!)not json

# BODY:
  • client_id (string, required) - your client id
  • client_secret (string, required) - your client secret
  • grant_type (string, required) = client_credentials
# Example:
client_id: [your client id]
client_secret: [your client secret]
grant_type: client_credentials

# Response

Type: json

# BODY:
  • access_token (string)
  • expires_in (int) - time live token in second
  • token_type (string)
  • scope (string)

Status: 200 (OK)

# Example:
{
    "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IlJ2eURPZEF...",
    "expires_in": 3600,
    "token_type": "Bearer",
    "scope": "external-api"
}

# Errors:

Status: 400 (Bad request)

{
    "error": "invalid_request"
}

# Create order

# Request

Url: https://api.vektor-adv.com/api/orders
Method: POST
Type: JSON
Headers:

  • Authorization: Bearer [YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN]
  • Content-Type: application/json
# BODY:
  • orderId (uuid, required) - generate client side
  • customer (object, required)
    • customer.email (string, required)
    • customer.name (string)
    • customer.phone (string)
  • certificates (array, required)
    • certificates[0].id (uuid, required) - get from Get certificates
    • certificates[0].quantity (int,required)
# Example:
{
   "orderId": "B5AA69DF-61A5-4D97-B1FB-4F6772DFBBEB",
   "customer": {
       "email": "test@test.test",
       "phone": "79251153242",         
       "name": "John Doe",
   },
   "certificates": [
       {
           "id": "A25714EA-F9E6-4D53-94FC-6F9D0587BB9D",
           "quantity": 1
       },
       {
           "id": "53AF1480-1D33-41CA-A08E-0BDC4BD318D6",
           "quantity": 1
       }
   ]
}

# Response

Type: json

Status: 200 (OK)

# Errors

Status: 400 (Bad request)

{
 "message": "Invalid request",
 "status": 400,
 "errors": {
   "Customer.Email": [
     "The Email field is required."
   ]
 }
}

# Get certificates

# Request

Url: https://api.vektor-adv.com/api/certificates
Method: GET
Type: JSON
Headers:

  • Authorization: Bearer [YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN]

# Response

# BODY:
  • id (uuid)
  • vendor (string)
  • unit (string) - nominal unit (ruble, month)
  • value (decimal) - nominal value
  • price (decimal)
[
 {
   "id": "1C730E2D-2323-46B7-8204-DDC7200B4976",
   "vendor": "Хофф",
   "unit": "rub",
   "value": 1000,
   "price": 1100
 },
 {
   "id": "0B6D23C8-9019-41DA-A34D-1A12B038742D",
   "vendor": "Л'Этуаль",
   "unit": "month",
   "value": 1,
   "price": 500
 }
]
